title: How to Beat Erazor Djiin from Sonic and the Secret Rings

steps.headline: Collect the Silver Ring for a quick boost of rings.
When he attempts a horizontal floor swipe, jump and do a Homing Attack.
When he stops and the camera goes to the side, brake and charge a jump.
steps.description: Then, when he rushes at you, use Time Break, jump and Homing Attack him.

text: First Battle Collect the Silver Ring for a quick boost of rings.  Dodge his vertical slices.  When he attempts a horizontal floor swipe, jump and do a Homing Attack.  When he stops and the camera goes to the side, brake and charge a jump. Then, when he rushes at you, use Time Break, jump and Homing Attack him. Second battle Collect rings at the start of the stage.  Shortly before Erazor slices, you will see where on the screen they will hit. Use this to avoid attacks. Use Time Break if you need it. When he fires his huge energy ball, use Speed Break to charge into it then start shaking the Wii Remote. Sonic will kick it back. Get up close and shake the Wii Remote to attack.
